title: TCS North America chairman Suresh Muthuswami quits
description: Suresh Muthuswami decided to resign to pursue opportunities outside, said a person close to the development without disclosing his next endeavour.
content: IT bellwether Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) has seen one of its biggest senior executive exits in the past year as Suresh Muthuswami, the chairman of North America region quit earlier this month.Muthuswami, who was appointed chair of TCS's business for the US and Canada in March 2022, resigned three months back serving the notice period with his last day on August 9.Two weeks ago, Muthuswami posted on LinkedIn, “As I prepare to close this chapter of my career at TCS, I wanted to take a moment to reflect on the incredible journey I’ve had over the past 26 years.”Muthuswami decided to resign to pursue opportunities outside, said a person close to the development without disclosing his next endeavour.In a statement, TCS said, "We can confirm that Suresh Muthuswami has decided to leave TCS after a 26 year career in the company. We wish him all the best.”
